This document is Invoice #1001, issued by Skyline Corp to Client 1 on January 24, 2024.

The invoice details the purchase of six different items totaling 199,022.

The items purchased include:
- 8 HDDs
- 14 Monitors (10 units at 7395 and 4 units at 4246)
- 4 Routers
- 6 Scanners
- 6 Ink Cartridges

The grand total due for this transaction is 199,022.
